file_content.text: [Darth Marr appears on the holoterminal and expresses relief at the Players' quick progress.]
[Darth Marr connects the Players to their extraction shuttle pilot, who prepares for a quick and clean landing--until a Republic squadron surprises him and shoots him out of the sky.]
[Master Cedral Gend appears on the holoterminal and confidently issues a warning to all Imperial forces on Yavin 4.]
[With time and options rapidly running out, the Players have no choice but to seize Cedral Gend's nearby base, Fort Victory, which currently serves as a major entry point for the Republic army.]
